pkgmetadata.longdescription: Repeated Measures Functional Analysis of Variance // The provided package implements the statistical tests for the functional repeated measures analysis problem (Kurylo and Smaga, 2023, arXiv:2306.03883). These procedures enable us to verify the overall hypothesis regarding equality, as well as hypotheses for pairwise comparisons (i.e., post hoc analysis) of mean functions corresponding to repeated experiments.
